component.name: Lightspeed Receiver
component.summary: Firmware for the Logitech Lightspeed Receiver (RQR39.xx)

description.p: A Lightspeed receiver allows you to connect a compatible gaming keyboard or mouse to a laptop or desktop computer with a USB receiver. Updating the firmware on your Lightspeed receiver improves performance, adds new features and fixes security issues.

This release addresses an encryption-key extraction vulnerability.
The vulnerability is complex to replicate and would require a hacker to be physically close to a target.
